name: quobyte
description: Quobyte is a software defined and fault tolerant distributed file system running on commodity hardware.
preInstallNotes:
This DC/OS Service is currently in preview. Installing Quobyte.
Required Mesos version for this package is 0.25.0 or newer.
In order to start the Quobyte framework a minimum of 1 cpu share and 768MB RAM need to be available.
Please ensure your devices have been set up (see https://github.com/quobyte/mesos-framework/blob/master/docs/usage.md#setup-storage-devices)
postUninstallNotes:
Quobyte has been uninstalled. Please follow the steps described at https://github.com/quobyte/dcos-quobyte/blob/master/uninstall_framework.md
 Please note that device tags do persist (see https://github.com/quobyte/mesos-framework#setup-devices)
